comment: Vivo Y20i is one one the best phone under this price♥️👌- well design and handy model- looks are really amazing 😉- Camara quality is good for this price- battery 🔋 is amazing 5000Ah really high power- fingerprint is awesome really really super fast and easy to unlock because its given with power button-i loved this white colour is awesome i loved it-Over all really thanks to vivo for giving such a wonderful mobile in this price♥️ Thanks to amezon- blindly u can buy this 📱 mobile
Good, I think it is better mobile than other mobiles in segment.
Overall a decent phone for basic users.
Charger is not type C. Also display is not upto the mark.
Product was as per expectations in a good packaging. Very satisfied performance at this reasonable cost. Thank you Amazon.
I like all the things and specially game mode and fastest phone in this range hatts off this phone but back side camera is not satisfying me but front is amazing.
I love this ❤️ mobile because it's designed so good 🤩🤩 and performance is also  good ☺️ but phone charger is so slow 😣 😑 but overall phone is so good 👌
This is the best phone you can get for this price.
Nice worth for money... Next day delivery amazing...
